trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que identifica exclusivamente o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the automation identifier.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o identificador de automação.

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor do identificador de automação é o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, this method gets the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não for definida, esse método obtém o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filhos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentPageViewAutomationPeer" />.
